description: Currently contributing as a software developer in a fast-paced startup, focused on delivering real-world solutions through innovative software projects.
Enhanced the template builder by adding new features, which improved customization options and boosted user experience by 20%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to streamline deployment workflows, leading to a 10% reduction in downtime and ensuring faster releases.
Developed a fully-functional admin panel from scratch, implementing RESTful API integrations to improve data management and enhance user control.
Optimized front-end React components, reducing page load times by 25% and significantly improving application responsiveness across devices.
Worked closely with the backend team to integrate RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless and efficient data flow between the frontend and server.
